name: Retirement Forecast File
summary: An RF1 file is a data file created by Denali Documents Retirement Forecast, a now-discontinued app for retirement planning. It contains details like income, expenses, savings, and other variables that help users project their future financial situation for retirement. Retirement Forecast users can save and open RF1 files to preserve and load their retirement scenarios for ongoing adjustments and analysis.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
